mapper.sql: select t.unsubscribe_id, t.trans_type, t.unsubscribe_mobile, t.unsubscribe_status,t.remark,t.create_datetime from s_unsubscribe t
mapper.insert: insert into s_unsubscribe (trans_type, unsubscribe_mobile, unsubscribe_status, remark,create_datetime) values (#{transType}, #{unsubscribeMobile}, #{unsubscribeStatus}, #{remark},current_timestamp())
mapper.select: select t.trans_type, t.unsubscribe_mobile, t.unsubscribe_status from s_unsubscribe t where t.unsubscribe_status = 100
mapper.update: update s_unsubscribe t set t.trans_type = #{transType}, t.unsubscribe_mobile = #{unsubscribeMobile}, t.unsubscribe_status = #{unsubscribeStatus}, t.remark = #{remark} where t.unsubscribe_id = #{unsubscribeId}
mapper.select: select count(0) from s_unsubscribe where unsubscribe_mobile = #{mobile} and unsubscribe_status = 100
